languages.text: "Пока просто предупреждаю. Патент не является гарантом вседозволенности. Многие Вольные Торговцы забывают об этом, и эта ошибка неминуемо стоит им жизни. Я могу закрыть глаза на пару-тройку проступков, но когда они превращаются в систему... С закосневшими еретиками у Инквизиции разговор короткий, и мне бы не хотелось его проводить с тобой".

"For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."
languages.original_text: "Пока просто предупреждаю. Патент не является гарантом вседозволенности. Многие Вольные Торговцы забывают об этом, и эта ошибка неминуемо стоит им жизни. Я могу закрыть глаза на пару-тройку проступков, но когда они превращаются в систему... С закосневшими еретиками у Инквизиции разговор короткий, и мне бы не хотелось его проводить с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "I am only warning you for now. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten that, only to pay with their life every time. I can turn a blind eye to a misdemeanour or two, but when they become systemic... Suffice is to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those with you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I can turn a blind eye to a misdemeanour or two, but when they become systemic... Suffice is to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those with you."

I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «De momento es solo una advertencia. Su patente no es una licencia para hacer cuanto le plazca. Más de un Comerciante Independiente ha olvidado ese detalle y el error ha terminado costándole la vida. Puedo hacer la vista gorda ante algún que otro desliz, pero si se vuelven habituales... Sepa que las conversaciones de la Inquisición con los herejes más pertinaces suelen ser breves, y preferiría no tener una de esas con usted».
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: «De momento es solo una advertencia. Su patente no es una licencia para hacer cuanto le plazca. Más de un Comerciante Independiente ha olvidado ese detalle y el error ha terminado costándole la vida. Puedo hacer la vista gorda ante algún que otro desliz, pero si se vuelven habituales... Sepa que las conversaciones de la Inquisición con los herejes más pertinaces suelen ser breves, y preferiría no tener una de esas con usted».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “目前仅仅是个警告而已。尽管你拥有授状，但你并没有为所欲为的权力。许多行商浪人忘记了这点，也不可避免地付出了生命的代价。我可以对偶尔的不端行为睁一只眼闭一只眼，但如果这变成了系统性的行为……那我只想说，审判庭与顽固异端分子的谈话通常很短暂，而我不希望和你进行那样的谈话。”
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: “目前仅仅是个警告而已。尽管你拥有许可证，但你并没有为所欲为的权力。许多行商浪人忘记了这点，也不可避免地付出了生命的代价。我可以对偶尔的不端行为睁一只眼闭一只眼，但如果这变成了系统性的行为……那我只想说，审判庭与顽固异端分子的谈话通常很短暂，而我不希望和你进行那样的谈话。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pour l'heure, c'est un simple avertissement. Votre lettre de marque ne vous donne nullement le droit de faire comme bon vous semble. Nombre de libres-marchands l'oublient et c'est une erreur qui leur coûte inévitablement la vie. Je veux bien fermer les yeux de temps à autre sur de petits délits occasionnels, mais quand vos méfaits se généralisent... Inutile de vous dire que les conversations entre l'Inquisition et les hérétiques endurcis sont assez brèves, et que je préférerais éviter d'en arriver là avec vous. »
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: « Pour l'heure, c'est un simple avertissement. Votre lettre de marque ne vous donne nullement le droit de faire comme bon vous semble. Nombre de libres-marchands l'oublient et c'est une erreur qui leur coûte inévitablement la vie. Je veux bien fermer les yeux de temps à autre sur de petits délits occasionnels, mais quand vos méfaits se généralisent... Inutile de vous dire que les conversations entre l'Inquisition et les hérétiques endurcis sont assez brèves, et que je préférerais éviter d'en arriver là avec vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「今のところは警告に過ぎない。あなたの令状は、好き勝手にやってもいいというライセンスではないのだ。多くの自由開拓者が、このことを忘れて命を落としている。ささいな犯罪には目をつぶることはできるが、それが組織的なものになると…異端審問庁と、無感覚な異端者との間で交わされる言葉は短くなりがちだ。俺はあなたとはそうならないことを願っている」
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: 「今のところは警告に過ぎない。あなたの令状は、好き勝手にやってもいいというライセンスではないのだ。多くの自由開拓者が、このことを忘れて命を落としている。ささいな犯罪には目をつぶることはできるが、それが組織的なものになると…異端審問庁と、無感覚な異端者との間で交わされる言葉は短くなりがちだ。俺はあなたとはそうならないことを願っている」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Vorerst ist es nur eine Warnung. Euer Handelsbrief ist kein Freischein, zu tun, was Ihr wollt. Schon viele Freihändler haben das vergessen, und sie alle hat es unweigerlich das Leben gekostet. Bei einem gelegentlichen Fehltritt kann ich ein Auge zudrücken. Wenn sie aber systemisch werden ... Sagen wir einfach: Die Gespräche der Inquisition mit abgehärteten Ketzern sind meist sehr kurz, und ich würde ungern ein solches Gespräch mit Euch führen müssen."
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: "Vorerst ist es nur eine Warnung. Euer Handelsbrief ist kein Freischein, zu tun, was Ihr wollt. Schon viele Freihändler haben das vergessen, und sie alle hat es unweigerlich das Leben gekostet. Bei einem gelegentlichen Fehltritt kann ich ein Auge zudrücken. Wenn sie aber systemisch werden ... Sagen wir einfach: Die Gespräche der Inquisition mit abgehärteten Ketzern sind meist sehr kurz, und ich würde ungern ein solches Gespräch mit Euch führen müssen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdilik sadece uyarıyorum. Ruhsatname, istediğini yapabilme izni vermez. Birçok Hür Tacir, bu hakikati unutmuş olup bu hata da canlarına mal olmuştur. Arada yapılan hatalara göz yumabilirim ama bu hatalar sürekli hâl alırsa... Şu kadarını söyleyeyim: Engizisyon'un azılı kâfirlerle yaptığı konuşmalar genelde kısa sürer, seninle öyle bir konuşma yapmak istemem."
languages.original_text: "For now, it is only a warning. Your Warrant is not a licence to do as you please. Many a Rogue Trader has forgotten this, and this mistake inevitably costs them their life. I can turn a blind eye to the occasional misdemeanour, but when they become systemic... Suffice to say that the Inquisition's conversations with hardened heretics tend to be short, and I'd rather not have one of those conversations with you."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdilik seni sadece uyarıyorum. Ruhsatname, istediğini yapabilmen için bir lisans değil. Birçok Hür Tacir bu hakikati unutmuş, bu hata canlarına mal olmuştur. Arada yapılan hatalara göz yumabilirim ama bu hatalar sürekli bir hâle gelirse... Şu kadarını söyleyeyim: Engizisyon'un azılı kâfirlerle konuşmaları genelde kısa sürer, seninle öyle bir konuşma yapmak istemem."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
